channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: On path way/ public road, 7th August
item.description:
Car has been in this state for months. No MOT and marked as sorn, but clearly not on private land or garage. Car is no fit state to be on public road or footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Joan Crescent, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally parked, post collision vehicle, 7th August
item.description:
Illegally parked white van, with blown up air bags and damaged front indicating involvment in a serious collision. Most likely won't pass mot which is due. Reg DV21 VFD

item.title: Consistently overflowing bin and dumping, 7th August
item.description:
These doors and dumped items have been here for weeks. This bin is constantly overflowing and obviously not being collected frequently enough. It’s disgusting. Please arrange a collection of the dumped items as the bin men don’t take them

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 graffiti tags, 7th August
item.description:
There is a large graffiti tag on the top of the cycle storage locker by co op car park on bourdon road. another tag is on the rear of the newly installed electric charging box and another is on the wall of the electric sub station. the tags are all from the same person.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourdon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree grown around street light blocking it's light from reaching the road, 7th August
item.description:
Street light on west side of Gloucester Place immediately opposite No.12 W1U 8HA and just south of bus shelter for stop K. Tree branches have grown around light and leaves are blocking almost all light from reaching the road. Also branches are swaying in the wind into the light. Can either the branches be cut back so as to allow the light to reach the road or can the light be replaced with a short one similar to those around the inside of Portman Square where a similar problem exists. More generally can the fake old-fashioned lights which throw their light 360o be replaced with cowled lights which only light the intended area (pavement and road) and not shine into the windows of the nearby and surrounding buildings. It's 2025. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Place, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No stop line, 7th August
item.description:
Hornsey Rd, north bound, at the junction of Tollington Park (east) there is a set of traffic lights with a crossing. This does not look to be a repeater light of the lights at the junction of Tollington Way (west) as these are not in-sync. Should there be a stop line here?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hornsey Road, Holloway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severely overgrown garden 44 Navarino Road has not been cleared in years., 7th August
item.description:
The garden is so overgrown it is growing into adjacent neighbouring gardens. It is a source of insects and bug as well as housing foxes which are infiltrating the area, particularly mosquitos
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Navarino Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in car parking area, 7th August
item.description:
Items shown in photo dumped by tree outside back emergency gates to Woolwich Poly. In car park area of Waterfield Close maisonettes. Access by vehicle from Epstein Road. Enter car parking area and bed base, table and other items immediately ahead under tree by school gate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hutchins Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rat(s) living in greenspace, 7th August
item.description:
There's at least one rat living in there at the moment. Might be a good idea to put down some poison traps before we have a never ending rat rave going on. Thx!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Lane, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Fly Tipping on 13 Reighton Road, 7th August
item.description:
